meanings.definition: A spread made from vegetable oils, used as a substitute for butter.
meanings.sent1: I spread margarines on my toast instead of butter.
meanings.sent2: The store sells different brands of margarines.
meanings.sent3: When the margarines started dancing in the pan, I knew it was time to cook.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as smooth as margarines melting on warm bread.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked bread with margarines was irresistible.

meanings.sent1: She bought two tubs of margarines from the store.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for three tablespoons of margarines.
meanings.sent3: The margarines on the table seemed to be having a meeting.
meanings.sent4: The margarines in the fridge were multiplying like rabbits.
meanings.sent5: The kitchen was filled with the aroma of various margarines.
